column5: Details
Your coach will brief and walkthrough the SC call flow and prepare you for assessments

Study call flow slides. Record your Call Intro using Lark Meeting: Pick 1 scenario from the provided options and share recording with your coach. If training with peers, roleplay together (each pick different scenarios)
Study Objection Handling slides to understand how to manage objections effectively
Your coach will provide feedback, reveal your score, and address areas of improvement
Choose 1 F&B scenario + 1 Retail scenario from Objection Handling slides. Record 2 separate roleplays on Lark Meeting and share with your coach. Goal: 2 recordings per person
Review closing call recordings and take notes on objection handling and effective closing techniques
Your coach will provide feedback, reveal your scores (F&B + Retail), and address areas of improvement
Using the same scenarios from Objection Handling, incorporate your Closing pitch (refer to slides). Record on Lark and share with your coach
Player: Using the same scenario you picked earlier for Objection Handling, incoporate your Closing pitch (refer to slide 18-20), record on Lark and share it to your coach.
Your coach will provide feedback, reveal your Closing score, and address areas of improvement
Combine Intro + Objection Handling + Closing into one complete call. Refer to Assessment Scenario List. Record on Lark Meeting and share with your coach
Study Tools slides to understand SC tools (Salesforce, etc.). Ensure you can log in and navigate confidently
Your coach will provide feedback, reveal your Full Call score, and address areas of improvement
Gather and recall all feedback from your coach. Apply suggested improvements during Mock Test
2 rounds: One F&B scenario + One Retail scenario. Join scheduled Lark meetings on time. Each call should not exceed 15 minutes. 80% pass required for both rounds
Your coach will provide feedback, reveal your Mock Test score, and advise next steps
Study Tools slides and prepare for Tools Assessment
Based on your Mock scenario, create a Lead following the Tools Assessment doc. Document step-by-step on Salesforce
You've officially graduated! 🎓
